questions.question: Zoom into the 2014 to 2016 period to see the exact percentage values of the sharp dip and recovery in electricity access.

answer.value:
The dip in 2015 drops to approximately 71%, which is a 19% fall from the 2014 peak of 90%.
The recovery is rapid, with access rebounding to 98% by 2016, surpassing the previous peak.

reasoning.reasoning: The sharp fluctuation between 2014 and 2016 is a critical event that requires precise values to understand its severity. A single zoom action provides the exact percentage points needed to quantify the disruption and recovery.
